title: Principal Software Engineer - Infrastructure
description: We're seeking a Principal Engineer to lead our infrastructure engineering team. You'll architect and build large-scale distributed systems processing billions of events daily. This is a high-impact individual contributor role working with our CTO. Requirements: 10+ years of software engineering, 5+ years in infrastructure/distributed systems, deep expertise in system design and scalability, experience mentoring senior engineers. Tech stack: Go, Kubernetes, Kafka, PostgreSQL, Redis, AWS/GCP. Remote-first company with engineers worldwide.
test_case_notes: High seniority position (Principal level). Tests seniority matching and experience level scoring. Should still match if user has sufficient experience, but may note seniority gap.
